metadata.title: CVE-2022-31624 on Ubuntu 22.04 ESM (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: MariaDB Server before 10.7 is vulnerable to Denial of Service. Whileexecuting the plugin/server_audit/server_audit.c method log_statement_ex,the held lock lock_bigbuffer is not released correctly, which allows localusers to trigger a denial of service due to the deadlock.

criterions.comment: mariadb-10.6 package in esm-apps/jammy is affected and may need fixing.
